00050 static void rna_cloth_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00051 {
00052     Object *ob = (Object*)ptr->id.data;
00053 
00054     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00055     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00056 }
00057 
00058 static void rna_cloth_pinning_changed(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00059 {
00060     Object *ob = (Object*)ptr->id.data;
00061 /*  ClothSimSettings *settings = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data; */
00062     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*)modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Cloth);
00063 
00064     cloth_free_modifier(clmd);
00065 
00066     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00067     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00068 }
00069 
00070 static void rna_cloth_reset(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00071 {
00072     Object *ob = (Object*)ptr->id.data;
00073     ClothSimSettings *settings = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00074 
00075     settings->reset = 1;
00076 
00077     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00078     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00079 }

00081 
00082 static void rna_ClothSettings_max_bend_set(struct PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00083 {
00084     ClothSimSettings *settings = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00085     
00086     /* check for clipping */
00087     if (value < settings->bending)
00088         value = settings->bending;
00089     
00090     settings->max_bend = value;
00091 }
00092 
00093 static void rna_ClothSettings_max_struct_set(struct PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00094 {
00095     ClothSimSettings *settings = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00096     
00097     /* check for clipping */
00098     if (value < settings->structural)
00099         value = settings->structural;
00100     
00101     settings->max_struct = value;
00102 }
00103 
00104 static void rna_ClothSettings_mass_vgroup_get(PointerRNA *ptr, char *value)
00105 {
00106     ClothSimSettings *sim = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00107     rna_object_vgroup_name_index_get(ptr, value, sim->vgroup_mass);
00108 }

00110 static int rna_ClothSettings_mass_vgroup_length(PointerRNA *ptr)
00111 {
00112     ClothSimSettings *sim = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00113     return rna_object_vgroup_name_index_length(ptr, sim->vgroup_mass);
00114 }

00160     Object *ob = (Object*)ptr->id.data;

00166 static void rna_ClothSettings_rest_shape_key_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00167 {
00168     Object *ob = (Object*)ptr->id.data;
00169     ClothSimSettings *sim = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00170 
00171     sim->shapekey_rest = rna_object_shapekey_index_set(ob->data, value, sim->shapekey_rest);
00172 }

00174 static void rna_ClothSettings_gravity_get(PointerRNA *ptr, float *values)
00175 {
00176     ClothSimSettings *sim = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00177 
00178     values[0] = sim->gravity[0];
00179     values[1] = sim->gravity[1];
00180     values[2] = sim->gravity[2];
00181 }
00182 
00183 static void rna_ClothSettings_gravity_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const float *values)
00184 {
00185     ClothSimSettings *sim = (ClothSimSettings*)ptr->data;
00186 
00187     sim->gravity[0] = values[0];
00188     sim->gravity[1] = values[1];
00189     sim->gravity[2] = values[2];
00190 }
00191 
00192 static char *rna_ClothSettings_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00193 {
00194     Object *ob = (Object*)ptr->id.data;
00195     ModifierData *md = modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Cloth);
00196 
00197     return md ? BLI_sprintfN("modifiers[\"%s\"].settings", md->name) : NULL;
00198 }
00199 
00200 static char *rna_ClothCollisionSettings_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00201 {
00202     Object *ob = (Object*)ptr->id.data;
00203     ModifierData *md = modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Cloth);
00204 
00205     return md ? BLI_sprintfN("modifiers[\"%s\"].collision_settings", md->name) : NULL;
00206 }

00210 static void rna_def_cloth_sim_settings(BlenderRNA *brna)
00211 {
00212     StructRNA *srna;
00213     PropertyRNA *prop;
00214     
00215     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ClothSettings", NULL);
00216     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Cloth Settings", "Cloth simulation settings for an object");
00217     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "ClothSimSettings");
00218     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_ClothSettings_path");
00219     
00220     /* goal */
00221     
00222     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "goal_min", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00223     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "mingoal");
00224     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00225     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Goal Minimum",
00226                              "Goal minimum, vertex group weights are scaled to match this range");
00227     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00228 
00229     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "goal_max", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00230     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "maxgoal");
00231     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00232     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Goal Maximum",
00233                              "Goal maximum, vertex group weights are scaled to match this range");
00234     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00235 
00236     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "goal_default", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00237     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "defgoal");
00238     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00239     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Goal Default",
00240                              "Default Goal (vertex target position) value, when no Vertex Group used");
00241     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00242     
00243     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "goal_spring", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00244     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "goalspring");
00245     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 0.999f);
00246     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Goal Stiffness", "Goal (vertex target position) spring stiffness");
00247     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00248     
00249     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "goal_friction", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00250     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "goalfrict");
00251     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 50.0f);
00252     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Goal Damping", "Goal (vertex target position) friction");
00253     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00254 
00255     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "internal_friction", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00256     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "velocity_smooth");
00257     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00258     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Internal Friction", "");
00259     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00260 
00261     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "collider_friction", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00262     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "collider_friction");
00263     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00264     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Collider Friction", "");
00265     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00266 
00267     /* mass */
00268 
00269     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "mass", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00270     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10.0f);
00271     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mass", "Mass of cloth material");
00272     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00273 
00274     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "vertex_group_mass", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00275     RNA_def_property_string_funcs(prop, "rna_ClothSettings_mass_vgroup_get", "rna_ClothSettings_mass_vgroup_length",
00276                                   "rna_ClothSettings_mass_vgroup_set");
00277     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mass Vertex Group", "Vertex Group for pinning of vertices");
00278     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_pinning_changed");
00279     
00280     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "gravity", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_ACCELERATION);
00281     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00282     RNA_def_property_range(prop, -100.0, 100.0);
00283     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_ClothSettings_gravity_get", "rna_ClothSettings_gravity_set", NULL);
00284     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Gravity", "Gravity or external force vector");
00285     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00286 
00287     /* various */
00288 
00289     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "air_damping", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00290     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "Cvi");
00291     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10.0f);
00292     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Air Damping", "Air has normally some thickness which slows falling things down");
00293     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00294 
00295     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "vel_damping", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00296     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "vel_damping");
00297     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00298     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Velocity Damping",
00299                              "Damp velocity to help cloth reach the resting position faster "
00300                              "(1.0 = no damping, 0.0 = fully dampened)");
00301     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00302 
00303     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_pin_cloth", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00304     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL);
00305     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Pin Cloth", "Enable pinning of cloth vertices to other objects/positions");
00306     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_pinning_changed");
00307     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00308 
00309     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "pin_stiffness", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00310     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "goalspring");
00311     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 50.0);
00312     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Pin Stiffness", "Pin (vertex target position) spring stiffness");
00313     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00314 
00315     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "quality", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00316     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "stepsPerFrame");
00317     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 4, 80);
00318     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Quality",
00319                              "Quality of the simulation in steps per frame (higher is better quality but slower)");
00320     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00321 
00322     /* springs */
00323 
00324     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_stiffness_scale", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00325     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_SCALING);
00326     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Stiffness Scaling",
00327                              "If enabled, stiffness can be scaled along a weight painted vertex group");
00328     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00329     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00330     
00331     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "spring_damping", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00332     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "Cdis");
00333     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 50.0f);
00334     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Spring Damping",
00335                              "Damping of cloth velocity (higher = more smooth, less jiggling)");
00336     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00337     
00338     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "structural_stiffness", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00339     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "structural");
00340     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10000.0f);
00341     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Structural Stiffness", "Overall stiffness of structure");
00342     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00343 
00344     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "structural_stiffness_max", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00345     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "max_struct");
00346     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10000.0f);
00347     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_ClothSettings_max_struct_set", NULL);
00348     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Structural Stiffness Maximum", "Maximum structural stiffness value");
00349     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00350

00353                                   "rna_ClothSettings_struct_vgroup_length",
00354                                   "rna_ClothSettings_struct_vgroup_set");

00436 
00437 static void rna_def_cloth_collision_settings(BlenderRNA *brna)
00438 {
00439     StructRNA *srna;
00440     PropertyRNA *prop;
00441     
00442     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ClothCollisionSettings", NULL);
00443     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Cloth Collision Settings",
00444                            "Cloth simulation settings for self collision and collision with other objects");
00445     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "ClothCollSettings");
00446     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_ClothCollisionSettings_path");
00447 
00448     /* general collision */
00449 
00450     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_collision", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00451     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", CLOTH_COLLSETTINGS_FLAG_ENABLED);
00452     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Enable Collision", "Enable collisions with other objects");
00453     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00454 
00455     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "repel_force", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);

00458     RNA_def_property_float_default(prop, 1.0f);

00486                              "How many collision iterations should be done. (higher is better quality but slower)");

00488

00490

00494     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");

00500     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00501

00505     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00506 
00507     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "self_collision_quality", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00508     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "self_loop_count");
00509     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, 10);
00510     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Self Collision Quality",
00511                              "How many self collision iterations should be done "
00512                              "(higher is better quality but slower)");
00513     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");
00514 
00515     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "group", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00516     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00517     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Collision Group", "Limit colliders to this Group");
00518     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_cloth_update");

00521 void RNA_def_cloth(BlenderRNA *brna)
00522 {
00523     rna_def_cloth_sim_settings(brna);
00524     rna_def_cloth_collision_settings(brna);
